channel.title: Some guy using BM media in his portfolio
channel.description: pretty much just the title. found this guy on the stanley parable moddb page trying to get involved in the remake, and this is his portfolio [url]https://www.jozefmutis.eu/portfolio/[/url]

item.title: Some guy using BM media in his portfolio
item.dc:creator: Medkit
item.description:
Dr. Karamazov:

GRAMMARZ FAIL.

How can you work ‘at’ the Source Engine? It’s a place?

Maybe it’s a local BM fan club… or… maybe the industry? :jizz:

item.source: Some guy using BM media in his portfolio

item.title: Some guy using BM media in his portfolio
item.dc:creator: Mont_Blanc
item.description:
danielsangeo:

And, if he gets hired to do a job based on what is in that portfolio and he can’t do something more than…well, what Danny Smith made, how long do you think he’ll be on the job?

Danny’s moddb page made my day. It’s so awesome I don’t understand why he isn’t on BM’s fine team.

Read full topic

item.title: Some guy using BM media in his portfolio
item.dc:creator: Dr_Karamazov
item.description:
For me the biggest glaring problem is that he is using this as a portfolio and he hasn’t bothered to spell check.

GRAMMARZ FAIL.

How can you work ‘at’ the Source Engine? It’s a place?
